item.title: So, linked-in is using cfengine and svn this year, right now, in 2014. Consi...
item.description:
So, linked-in is using cfengine and svn this year, right now, in 2014. Consider that git has been release quality for nine years this December. Â  If they replaced svn with git, which is a no brainer, then maybe they could appreciate how painful cfengine is.
